actions.name: Pilfering Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the wharfling can steal one item the target is wearing or carrying, provided the item weighs no more than 10 pounds, isn't a weapon, and isn't wrapped around or firmly attached to the target, such as a shirt or armor.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The wharfling can breathe air and water.
